resources.string: It looks like you\'ve given busboy permission to see your location, but the location setting is turned off. To see nearby stops, please enable the location setting.

You can search for nearby stops if you've granted busboy permission to view your location and have the location setting enabled. If you're already at your stop, you can find upcoming buses by entering your stop ID (found at the bottom of the sign) and pressing the search button. 

Nearby: 
Long pressing a 'nearby' stop will display a map of walking directions from your location to the stop, and short pressing will display a list of upcoming buses for that stop. By default, Busboy shows you all stops within 1000 feet of your location. You can specify any distance up to 5000 feet, or select a line from the drop-down menu to see only stops that serve that line. 

Predictions: 
Short pressing a bus prediction will display the current location of that bus on a map. Long pressing a prediction will show you detailed information about that bus (its license plate, VIN number, seating capacity etc). Clicking the heart button will add that stop to your favorites. 

Favorites: 
Short pressing an item on your favorites list will show you upcoming buses for that stop. 
Long pressing a favorite will allow you to delete a stop from your favorites. 

For bug reports, feature requests or contributions, please visit github.com/taitsmith/busboy or send an email to busboy@taitsmith.com
